ygData.subject: Been there done that, Flameless Lantern
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, so after the solution for Firewater was given to me, I tried Tinkering the stuff, simple. Worked every time. Then I tried the only item that I could afford
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, so after the solution for Firewater was given
to me, I tried Tinkering the stuff, simple. Worked
every time. Then I tried the only item that I could afford and tada, the first(in the game I think) Flameless Lantern (gave it away) then two
failures. But all in all I made 3. They seem to be
at least as bright as Lightstone, possibly brighter, but being a Gnome, what do I need it for? :) But it's been done. Tinkering works.
Going to put in my order for Pie Tins and start
making Compasses. And as soon as I find a tattered
cloak, it's Thermal Cloak time. Man I need more money.

-Zikkin
